[[File:Tetris Logo.png|thumb|300px|Logo for the Tetris Franchise]]
'''''Minecraft x Tetris''''' is a merchandise collaboration between ''[[Minecraft]]'' and the ''{{Wikipedia|Tetris}}'' gaming franchise.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/tetris-collaboration|title=Block Game Collaborative Projects|author=Amy Duong|website=TREND HUNTER|date=June 11, 2024}}</ref>

== Marketplace releases ==
=== Tetris ===
{{Main|Tetris (world)}}
[[File:Tetris DLC Key Art.jpg|300px|thumb|Key art for the DLC]]
A map taking the form of a dungeon crawler, beginning by playing the classic 2D version of Tetris, with a catch â€“ the Tetris shapes, known as Tetriminos, have been stolen. It turns out to have been by the [[Tetrimonster]] who, after "watching players place blocks wrong since the 1960s, has broken out of the game to seek vengeance."

=== Tetris Add-On ===
{{Main|Tetris Add-On}}
[[File:Tet Thumbnail 0.jpg|300px|thumb|Key art for the Add-On]]
An add-on was released on June 6, 2024, developed by [[Jigarbov Productions]]. This release allows players to use mino items and mobs in any survival world, introducing many unique gameplay features such as creating generator, which creating various Tetris figures, which falling from the sky.

== Soundtracks ==
{{Main|Minecraft: Tetris (Original Soundtrack)}}
As a promotion for the map, a soundtrack containing six songs from the world was released on July 30, 2024.
